column5: Just curious if anyone has ever tried putting a Gulp Alive minnow on a bare hook under a Polar Tipup and letting it sit, just like you would with a real live minnow.  It's not going to swim and move like a real minnow, but I wonder if the scent alone is enough to entice some bites on a set line like this.  Anyone try it?

I have tried for white fish with the gulp minnows on a 2 and 3 way spreader ! nothing yet has hit it or lost one on the rig . but i do tip all my badboy jigs with the 3" minnow with great success. hope this help just my observations so far

You know what? I've never tried that! I think next time I go into the park I'm gonna bring a pack of 3" Shad and try them against my buddy running real (dead) minnows!! In the park you cant use alive bait anyways so if these actually work it'd be nice to just use the GULP and not worry about stopping at the bait shop, making sure they're dead, dealing with the MNR etc etc...
I've tried it.... On a dead line and .... NOTHING!!! I've tried it on a Jiggin' rod and SUCCESS!!!  Gotta keep her movin'  RFS
I used them on a Windlass tipup b4 and they caught me some fish.
